name: Chennai
fun_fact: Fun fact: Chennai (formerly Madras) is the birthplace of the modern Indian film industry - the first Indian feature film was made here in 1912, and the city produces more films annually than Bollywood. It's also home to Marina Beach, the second longest urban beach in the world!

hero_dishes.name: Idli-Sambar-Chutney
hero_dishes.description: Fluffy fermented rice cakes with spiced lentil soup and coconut chutney
hero_dishes.origin_story: The holy trinity of South Indian breakfast - Chennai's idlis are legendarily soft. Murugan Idli Kadai is famous for serving nothing else
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Murugan Idli Kadai, Saravana Bhavan, Ratna CafÃ© (since 1948)

hero_dishes.name: Dosa (and its variations)
hero_dishes.description: Crispy fermented crepe - masala dosa stuffed with potato, paper dosa giant and thin, rava dosa with semolina
hero_dishes.origin_story: Chennai's dosa culture is serious - hotel tiffin (breakfast) is a daily ritual. Each restaurant has signature versions
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Saravana Bhavan, Hotel Saravana Bhavan (different!), Vasanta Bhavan

hero_dishes.name: Chettinad Chicken
hero_dishes.description: Fiery curry from the Chettinad region with 20+ spices, pepper-forward heat
hero_dishes.origin_story: From the Chettiar merchant community of Tamil Nadu - their spice trading history created this complex cuisine

hero_dishes.name: Filter Kaapi
hero_dishes.description: Strong South Indian coffee brewed through a metal filter, mixed with hot milk and served in steel tumbler-davara
hero_dishes.origin_story: Chennai runs on filter coffee - the ritual of 'pulling' coffee between vessels creates froth and cools it
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Everywhere - Indian Coffee House, Madras Coffee House, every street corner

signature_drinks.name: Filter Coffee
signature_drinks.description: Strong decoction coffee with boiled milk, sweetened to taste
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Multiple times daily - the tumbler-davara pour is performance art

signature_drinks.name: Nannari Sherbet
signature_drinks.description: Sweet drink made from sarsaparilla root, pink and refreshing
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: From street vendors in summer - essential Chennai heat relief

food_culture_notes: Vegetarian food dominates - Chennai is one of India's most vegetarian cities
Meals (rice with multiple curries on banana leaf) are the traditional lunch
Sowcarpet is the street food paradise - chaat, sundal, snacks galore
Saravana Bhavan started here and conquered the world (90+ countries)
